description: React hook 'useKYC' managing CRUD operations for KYC submissions in a Supabase database, including fetch, create, update, and delete functionalities for the 'kyc_submissions' table.

methods.name: fetchMySubmissions
methods.description: Fetches all KYC submissions for the current user from the database.

methods.name: createSubmission
methods.description: Creates a new KYC submission record for the current user with status 'pending'.

methods.name: updateSubmission
methods.description: Updates an existing submission owned by the current user.

methods.name: deleteSubmission
methods.description: Deletes a submission owned by the current user.
